group_1.textRight: I see... So you were attacked as well.

group_1.textLeft: They didn't seem to be in full force, so we were able @to win without incident, however...
...Has any information come from the @Kamihama Magia Union?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, to keep it brief...

group_1.narration: "Promised Blood, Tokime Clan, Neo-Magius, @and the Coordinators from out of the city..."
"This is all about Magical Girls that @the Kamihama Magia Union has encountered."
"Secondly, these outsider Magical Girl groups are@ all trying to acquire the Automatic Purification System@for their own purposes."

"And, the third and final thing... Each of them are @searching for these things called [textYellow:Kimochi] @that contain energy within Kamihama. @They need this powerful energy in order to take@the Automatic Purification System..."

group_1.textRight: Is that everything?

group_1.textLeft: ...There doesn't appear to be any discrepancy with @what they shared.

group_1.textRight: Unlike a certain someone, I'm not good at talking through my attitude.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, who might you be referring to?

group_1.textRight: Ahaha, I wonder who?

group_1.textLeft: ...How do you view the current situation?

group_1.textRight: It doesn't look good, that's for sure.
Especially the Promised Blood. @They...are not good.

group_1.textLeft: I am curious what the other teams are up to, but...
As long as we remain idle here, @they shouldn't attack us.
However, this Promised Blood group, as they call @themselves, appear to be different.

group_1.textRight: ...They may have only attacked us, but they've @already killed one girl in Kamihama City.
Their goal seems to be taking revenge on the @"Wings of Magius,"
who stole Witches, and any Kamihama Magical Girl, @but...
They've associated all of us as one group...

group_1.textLeft: People always believe they have a just cause...
(That we will be forgiven for making sacrifices in @the name of justice...)
So, you're still choosing to not join as well?

group_1.textRight: With the Kamihama Magia Union?
...Well, I've decided to keep connected with them @from the outside,
but I suppose there's plenty of ways to cooperate @with such a large group...
Besides, Konoha believes the Kamihama Magia @Union is being targeted,
so she's absolutely opposed to it.
And, well, I suppose I also agree with her line of @thinking.
I heard that the Promised Blood's main force went @straight for Iroha's group.
...So, how about you?
The way you phrased it, it sounds like you're @thinking of joining?

group_1.textLeft: Aren't you reading a little too far into it?

group_1.textRight: I am?

group_1.textLeft: ...Though I think it is time to come up with a @response.

group_1.textRight: Hehh...?
